alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 2:16PM MST until September 13 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 215 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near O`Leary Peak, or 18 miles north of Flagstaff, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Nalahiku Pueblo in Wupatki N.M., Wupatki National Monument, and Wupatki N.M.. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 434 and 443. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
